title: Using Deep Learning to Identify Artificial Satellite Trails in Multi-band Photometric Astronomical Images
summary: This research develops a deep learning method to identify artificial satellite trails in multi-band photometric astronomical images. It utilizes multi-band photometric survey observational data to address the challenge of satellite interference in astronomical observations.
usefulness_reason: The paper uses "survey observational data" which is relevant to "Survey data". However, it does not address "Spatio Temporal Point Process", "Spatio Temporal", "Point Process", or "Contextual dataset".
